# mapVisibleRangeWithOffset() function

Map current visible items and provide offset for each item.

**Signature:**

```typescript
mapVisibleRangeWithOffset: <T>(model: VirtualScroller, cb: (index: number, offset: number) => T) => T[]
```

**Returns**

T\[\]

Array of currently visible items

## Remarks

Used in scenarios, when each item is absolutely positioned
